Countries

The HEV TCP welcomes countries and organizations that will both benefit from and contribute to the sharing of information and resources on hybrid and electric vehicles.


  • Austria
  • Belgium
  • Canada
  • China
  • Denmark
  • Finland
  • France
  • Germany
  • Ireland
  • Italy
  • Norway
  • Republic of Korea
  • Spain
  • Sweden
  • Switzerland
  • The Netherlands
  • Turkey
  • United Kingdom
  • United States of America

The actual work on hybrid and electric vehicles is done through a variety of different Tasks that are focused on specific topics.
